attributes.action: ensure Steve Jobs of Apple Inc, is given an (Honary) Knighthood by the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steve Jobs founded Apple Computer 30 years ago, and has been the lynch-pin in 3 major personal computation products which for the large part have "changed the world";  the Macintosh, iPod and iPhone. 

The power that computation has had on peoples development, most notably in the fields of education, has been in the slipstream of Steve Jobs' notion that "a computer is a bicycle of the mind"

We the British People, should make it our business that this modern day Da Vinci is accordingly honoured.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
